title: Twitter Rants & Frustrated Players
description:
Welcome back to In the Crease! Linda and Emily start off this episode with some of the latest news around the league including: Robin Lehner's tweets and Jack Eichel's situation. After that they dive into the Atlantic division with their thoughts on who will emerge as division leaders and who will struggle to make it through the regular season.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Linda Cohn, Emily Kaplan
itunes:subtitle: Linda Cohn and Emily Kaplan give their perspective on Robin Lehner's Twitter rant and Jack Eichel's injury situation...
